Package com.shiroyama.chess2.chessboard.model

package com.shiroyama.chess2.chessboard.model
The com.shiroyama.chess2.chessboard.model package provides classes for representing the chess board, pieces, and game state in the Chess2 game. This package contains components that define the core model of the chess game, including the board representation, piece positioning with floating-point coordinates, and the underlying data structures needed for game logic.

Key components include:

  • ChessBoard - Manages the chess board state, piece movement, attacks, and promotions
  • TargetPoint - Represents positions on the chess board with floating-point coordinates for precise positioning

The model package serves as the foundation for the game mechanics, providing the data structures that the controller and view components interact with to create the complete Chess2 experience.
